text: Santiago Morandi Vidal (born 6 April 1984 in Montevideo, Uruguay) is a Uruguayan association football Goalkeeper currently playing for Deportes Melipilla of the Primera División B in Chile. ==Teams== * Central Español 2004–2007 * Progreso 2007–2008 * Flamengo-SP 2009 * Democrata (GV) 2009 * Suchitepéquez 2010-2012 * Heredia 2012 * Estudiantes de Altamira 2013 * Municipal 2013–2014 * Rentistas 2015 * Ñublense 2015–2016 * San Marcos de Arica 2016–2017 * Deportes Melipilla 2018–present ==References== * Profile at BDFA * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:Sportspeople from Montevideo Category:Central Español players Category:C.A. title: Santiago Morandi
